articles.title: Heightened Vigilance against Lee Myung Bak Group's Confrontation Hysteria Called for
articles.content:
Heightened Vigilance against Lee Myung Bak Group's Confrontation Hysteria Urged
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission Wednesday released the following statement rapping the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea for kicking up a confrontation racket against the DPRK from the outset of the new year:
					 Confrontation with fellow countrymen only leads to a war.
					
					 This is the historic lesson clearly taught by the past inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea, which has been reduced to dregs of the times and hordes of good-for-nothings more dead than alive, is, however, frantically kicking up the confrontation racket from the outset of the new year, failing to come to its senses.
					
					 On the morning of the New Year Lee in his room of Chongwadae phoned officers of the puppet marine corps on Paekryong Island, the biggest hotspot, and blustered that the "northern limit line" is their "territorial line" and "peace line" and maritime demarcation line to be defended till the south and the north are unified and "it should, therefore, be protected at the risk of their lives".
					
					 His outbursts may be interpreted as a spate of nonsensical talk made out of his ignorance of how the "territorial line" and the maritime demarcation line are drawn.
					
					 But one can not but pay attention to the fact that they are making desperate efforts to launch invasion against the north at any cost from the stand of the warmongers who cried for preserving the illegal "northern limit line". 
					
					 That day, Kim Kwan Jin, puppet defence minister, in his New Year message to the units of the three services of the south Korean armed forces, let loose sheer sophism that the north posed a "threat" to the peace on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world by disturbing GPS and launching missiles, etc. last year. He unhesitatingly called for maintaining "a perfect high-handed posture" and "decisively blowing up the bases for provocations and wiping out even the supporting forces" as the north may continue attempting "provocations based on the mode of striking the west while making noise in the east" in the new year, too.
					
					 Not content with these outpourings, the Lee group prodded the puppet Defence Ministry into developing such anti-DPRK psychological warfare as "lighting a lamp atop Aegibong" in the western sector of the front, which has been under way since December 22 last year, into an operation for scattering leaflets in the area of Cholwon in the central sector of the front from the New Year.
					
					 Ryu U Ik, puppet minister of Unification, too, talked such rubbish that the DPRK "should not test the patience of south Korea and the international community while developing nukes and missiles", "it should choose the road of reforms and opening, not going against the expectation of the public at home and abroad" and "the new leadership of the north should not be bound to the Cold War-minded framework."
					
					 They belong to the same group in terms of their ugly appearance and their ulterior motives. It is, therefore, self-evident that they cannot but reveal their true colors as die-hard confrontation maniacs accusing others.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should be vigilant against the group of traitors getting hysteric with confrontation racket against the DPRK from the outset of the new year.
					
					 Such ruckus is a blatant challenge to the trend of the times towards national reconciliation, unity and reunification. This is, at the same time, a revelation of a sinister plot against the nation and peace as it is intended to persistently stick to the confrontation policy against the DPRK which has gone totally bankrupt and lead it to a war of aggression at any cost.
					
					 It was also prompted by a crafty intention of the group to escape the punishment for the thrice-cursed crimes it committed during the five years of confrontation with compatriots by driving the inter-Korean ties into a total collapse and dashing the last hope for peaceful reunification.
					
					 In view of the illboding moves of the Lee group from the outset of the new year, the DPRK National Defence Commission clarifies the following stance internally and externally:
					
					 1. It is necessary to bar the group of traitors steeped in conservatism and confrontation to the marrow of their bones from seeking any room to subsist.
					
					 It is the steadfast determination of the DPRK to subordinate and orient everything to the great cause of national reunification from the standpoint of giving priority to the nation, attaching importance to the nation and achieving national unity.
					
					 Those confrontation elements standing against this cause should not be allowed to co-exist with us under any circumstances. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak has always remained the boss of the traitors taking the lead in inciting the confrontation.
					
					 It is quite impossible to expect from Lee a bold decision to care for the nation as he is no more than a rat and an idiot as branded by the south Korean people.
					
					  It would have been better if such traitor as Lee had not been born as a member of the Korean nation.
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin and Ryu U Ik are one and the same confrontation maniacs as Lee. They are making a desperate bid to carry on the confrontation policy which has been pursued during the five years of the Lee regime, unaware of the strong trend of the times.
					
					 It is said that if one has a bad brain, one's hands and feet can hardly work and if politics is wrong, a people are bound to have hard living. Lee Myung Bak's evil politics, Kim Kwan Jin's hysteria as reckless as trying to jump into fire with faggot on his back and the crafty nature of Ryu U Ik who has lived with poor trickery will bring only greater disaster to south Korean society.
					
					  It is the view of the people at present that south Korean society can be in peace and the day of reunification can be hastened only when such group of traitors is eliminated.
					
					  2. It is necessary to decisively foil by the concerted efforts of the nation any move to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen which may lead to a war.
					
					 It is our unchangeable stand to put a definite end to the state of armistice which is neither war nor peace.
					
					 The group's slight intrusion into territorial waters under the pretext of defending the illegal "northern limit line" and any anti-north psychological warfare such as farce of "lighting a lamp atop Aegibong" and operation to scatter leaflets are a product of its confrontation policy without exception and an undisguised act to provoke a war in breach of inter-Korean agreements and the Armistice Agreement.
					
					 The war-like forces will never escape the fate of a tiger moth. There is no exception for Kim Kwan Jin, too, as he is keen to find a pretext for provocations with his eyes reminiscent of cruel and sunken ones of a hungry gray wolf.
					
					 The DPRK had already clarified its principled stance that it would counter any provocation with a prompt retaliation and react to a war of aggression with a great just war for national reunification.
					
					 In order to build a reunified thriving nation without fail it is necessary to decisively frustrate by the concerted efforts of the nation any actions, big and small, for provoking a war.
					
					 3. All the trigger-happy forces should always remember that the DPRK had already declared a sacred war internally and externally.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK, including the large combined units on the front, had already received the operation plans finally ratified by the dignified Supreme Command.
					
					 The units of the three services are fully ready to go into action once an order is issued and mere pressing of buttons to open fire would turn everything into flames to wipe out enemies in a twinkle.
					
					 The group should not forget even a moment that what remains to be done is just to go into action.
					
					 All our service personnel and people are fully determined to do their utmost to defend the sovereignty more precious than their own lives and bring earlier the day of reunification, the cherished desire of the nation and the fellow countrymen.
					
					 No one should misjudge such faith and indomitable will of our army and people.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations now stand at the crossroads of whether they will remain in the state of confrontation and war just as they were in the last five years or they will head for dialogue and peace.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to make a responsible choice.

articles.title: Order of Kim Jong Il Awarded to Korean Committee of Space Technology
articles.content:
Order of Kim Jong Il Awarded to KCST
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Order of Kim Jong Il was awarded to the Korean Committee of Space Technology which succeeded in launching the satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, the first working satellite of the DPRK.
					 A relevant decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly was issued on Tuesday.

articles.title: Cuban People's Just Cause Sure to Triumph: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Cuban People's Just Cause Sure to Triumph: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday devotes an article to the day of victory in the Cuban revolution.
					 On January 1, 1959 Cuban revolutionaries and people toppled the pro-U.S. dictatorial regime and won victory in the revolution under the leadership of Fidel Castro, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 This marked a historic event which brought rosy future to the Cuban people who had languished in the chains of dictatorship and subjugation and paved the way for the building of socialist Cuba.
					
					 The Cuban people have victoriously advanced the socialist cause chosen by themselves, boldly shattering the imperialists' ceaseless moves for aggression and blockade with revolutionary principle and indomitable will under the unerring leadership of the Communist Party of Cuba.
					
					 All successes made in Cuba are the fruition of the devoted struggle of the Cuban party and people.
					
					 The just cause of the Cuban people dynamically advancing along the road of independence against imperialism and socialism is sure to triumph, concludes the article.

articles.title: Papers Editorially Call for Bringing about Turning Phase in Building Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Papers Call for Bringing About Turning Phase in Building Thriving Nation
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Papers here Wednesday editorially call for bringing about a turning phase in the building of a thriving nation in warm response to the New Year address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The army and people of the DPRK are highly proud of being the victors who decorated 2012 with heroic feats, bearing his address deep in mind, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un in his address said that Juche is the invariable path to be followed by the Party and people of the DPRK and the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the ever-victorious banner of the Korean revolution.
					
					 They should advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism to the last under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. Herein lies a sure guarantee for successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving nation, pioneered and advanced by great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 All service personnel and people in the DPRK are foreseeing in the New Year address the invincible power to be built along the road of Juche indicated by the great Generalissimos.
					
					 The daily calls on the service personnel and people across the country to successfully carry out the important tasks set forth in the address and thus bring about a turning phase in building a thriving nation and fulfil their revolutionary duties as soldiers and disciples of the great Generalissimos.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon them to wage a dynamic struggle to thoroughly implement the important tasks advanced in the address and glorify the significant year 2013 as a year of proud victory and thus bring earlier the final victory in the building of a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Probing Truth about Four-river Project
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Probing Truth about Four-river Project
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore carried an article "Aftereffect of project of four large rivers and measures for their recovery" written by Kim Jong Uk, honorary professor at Seoul National University.
					 The article recalled that the Lee Myung Bak regime has pushed ahead with the project, bragging that it would prevent drought and flood and ensure clean water.
					
					 The project, however, left land inundated and caused shoals of fishes to die and worsened water pollution, it deplored, adding:
					
					 Most of the dykes collapsed or are in the danger of sinking as they were built on sand through a reckless carrying out of the project and their beds were not dredged as designed.
					
					 Querying where did the ridiculous amount of money earmarked as expenses for the project go, the article went on:
					
					 In a word, the project is the worst scandal in history.
					
					 It demanded probe into the truth behind the project and rectification of the wrongs.

articles.title: S. Korean Society Unfit for Human Habitation: S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
S. Korean Society Unfit for Human Habitation: S. Korean Paper
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of innocent people are meeting deaths in south Korea due to the unpopular rule of the group of traitors, according to the south Korean paper Hangyore.
					 A few days ago a fire broke out in Kohung County in South Jolla Province, killing an old woman and her grandson.
					
					 Unable to pay the electricity fee sharply raised by the puppet government, they were compelled to use candles which caused the fire.
					
					 An old man living in Koje City, South Kyongsang Province committed suicide, cursing grievous society.
					
					 A countless number of people are left homeless in this biting cold or shivering with cold with empty stomachs in shelters no better than outside in south Korea.

articles.title: Congratulatory Messages, Letters to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Congratulatory Messages, Letters to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages and letters from organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Korean residents in Japan on the New Year 2013.
					 They were from the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers and School Clerks in Japan and other organizations of Chongryon, their affiliated bodies, Choson Sinbo Company, Korean News Service, Hagu Bookshop, Kumgang-san Opera Troupe, Kumgang Insurance Company, Committee for Promoting Korea-Japan Economic Exchange, Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan, Korean Publishers Hall and other enterprises, various local headquarters of Chongryon, Joson University and Koran schools at various levels in Japan and Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 They said that last year was a year of victory and glory in which all service personnel and people in the homeland glorified the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung as a grand political festival under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un and the DPRK emerged a dignified political and ideological power and a satellite manufacturer and launcher.
					
					 This year which marks the 65th anniversary of the DPRK, the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and which will witness the opening of the 23rd Congress of Chongryon will shine as a year of gigantic creation and change as it will see a landmark phase in the building of a thriving socialist nation in the advance of the new century of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 They expressed the resolution to dynamically advance the movement of Koreans in Japan along the road of Juche, the road of patriotism and the road of prosperity under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, regarding the behests of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as an immortal banner.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" was brought out in booklet by the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries on Dec. 25 last year.
					 The work, published on April 6, 2012, clarifies that it is a principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea forever. It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Congratulate DPRK on Its Successful Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Congratulate DPRK on Its Successful Satellite Launch
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Personages of Democratic Congo and Myanmar made public statements on Dec. 21 and 22 last year, congratulating the DPRK on its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2.
					 Jimmy Kikoni, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Democratic Congo, said that socialist Korea put its working satellite into its orbit, adding that it amounted to the demonstration of the truth and vitality of the Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung and developed by leader Kim Jong Il, and it is, at the same time, a brilliant embodiment of the principle to be consistently maintained by the DPRK -- independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un energetically led all the processes for the manufacture of the working satellite and its launch, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il, winning a shining victory.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, noted that the successful satellite launch of the DPRK fully demonstrated its tremendous might and its level of the development of latest science and technology.
					
					 He said that as Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the party, army and people of the country, the Korean people is waging a dynamic struggle for the building of a thriving nation and accomplishment of  the cause of national reunification, holding Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal leaders.
					
					 The Korean People's Army, commanded by Kim Jong Un, is growing to be invincible revolutionary armed forces, he noted.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the army and people of the DPRK would successfully carry out the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Remembrance Meetings Held at DPRK Missions Overseas
articles.content:
Remembrance Meetings Held at DPRK Missions Overseas
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place at DPRK embassies in Hanoi, Kuala Lumpur and Kinshasa from Dec. 13 to 17 last year to mark the first anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the venues of the meetings were photos of the peerlessly great men on their undying revolutionary feats.
					
					 Their participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Pham Tat Dong, chairman of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, said that Kim Jong Il was not only the great leader of the Korean people but a close friend of the Vietnamese people.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism will shed its rays as an eternal guiding idea of the DPRK, he noted, adding:
					
					 He keenly realized the deep reverence of the world people for President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il during his visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 100th Day of the Sun.
					
					 Congratulating the DPRK on its successful satellite launch, he stressed that it was a miracle, indeed, that the DPRK successfully launched the satellite despite the U.S. moves to stifle it.
					
					 He expressed his will to make sustained efforts to develop the friendly relations with the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Malaysian committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il said that the great idea and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il provide a sure guarantee for socialist cause in the DPRK and the cause of global independence.
					
					 Though Kim Jong Il passed away, he will always be remembered by the Malaysian and Korean peoples, he noted.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the Democratic Congolese committee for remembering Kim Jong Il, praised the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un for successfully carrying out the cause of immortalizing the leader and energetically leading the Korean people in their drive to build a thriving nation and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers and internet homepages of different countries devoted special write-ups to the 95th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The Russian newspaper Vladivostok on Dec. 12 last year carried an article titled "She Worked Hard for Women's Emancipation All Her Life" illustrated with her photo.
					
					 The article said a large number of Korean women grew to be excellent revolutionaries under the care of Kim Jong Suk who took part in the sacred war for the country's liberation at her early age under President Kim Il Sung's leadership and won fame as an anti-Japanese war hero and woman commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The Indonesian newspaper Suara Karya on Dec. 24 last year said in an article titled "Eternal Image Remembered by People" that short as Kim Jong Suk's life was, she is always remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives as an anti-Japanese war hero and outstanding woman revolutionary.
					
					 The Korean people erected her statues at time-honored places associated with her noble life and named some units after her august name, it added.
					
					 Polish internet homepage "DPRK" on the same day posted an article "Mother Is Always with Us" under the caption "Eternal Anniversaries" accompanied with her photo.
					
					 It carried an explanatory note that "December 24 is a significant day for the DPRK" and was illustrated with photos which she had taken with Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the days of the anti-Japanese armed struggle and in the period of building a new country after liberation and photos of Kim Jong Il inspecting units of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The internet homepage of the MS Travel Agency of Germany posted an article praising her revolutionary life and exploits accompanied with a photo showing her statue on the same day.

articles.title: Periodicos exhortan a abrir nueva fase en la construccion de Estado prospero socialista
articles.content:
Periodicos exhortan a abrir nueva fase en la construccion de Estado prospero socialista
						
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- En sendos editoriales divulgados hoy, los periodicos capitalinos exhortaron a dar la coyuntura trascendental en la construccion de Estado prospero socialista en pleno acato al mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					Todo el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea recibieron ese mensaje sintiendose triunfadores que han coronado el ano pasado con meritos heroicos, comienza el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					Juche es el unico camino que seguiran nuestro Partido y pueblo y el gran kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo es la bandera de todas las victorias de nuestra revolucion, senalo el Mariscal en su mensaje.
					
					Marchar recto y de modo consecuente por el camino de la independencia, de Songun y del socialismo con la bandera de kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo en alto, he aqui la garantia para cumplir la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construccion de Estado prospero, iniciadas e impulsadas por los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Leyendo el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal, todo el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea imaginan la invencible potencia a construirse segun el camino del Juche allanado por los Generalisimos.
					
					Ellos deben cumplir cabalmente las tareas presentadas en el mensaje, lograr el cambio decisivo en la construccion de Estado prospero y cumplir con el deber revolucionario que corresponde a los soldados y discipulos de los Generalisimos.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson subraya que todo el ejercito y el pueblo deben hacer de 2013 el ano de victorias mediante la lucha por materializar cabalmente las tareas presentadas en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo y adelantar cuanto antes la victoria final de la causa de construccion de Estado prospero socialista.

articles.title: Prestan servicios de fiesta tiendas y restaurantes de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Prestan servicios de fiesta tiendas y restaurantes de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Las bases de servicios publicos de esta capital estan ahora muy ocupadas.
					Segun un funcionario de la rama, el Almacen No. 1 de Pyongyang, el Almacen Pothonggang, la Tienda Pothonggang, el Supermercado del Area de Kwangbok y otros establecimientos comerciales de esta capital rebajaron los precios de algunos productos de primera necesidad, los industriales, los alimentos y otros.
					
					Por supuesto, las florerias y los quioscos de flor estan rodeados de clientes deseosos de comprar flores para sus queridos.
					
					En entrevista con la ACNC, la jefa de la empresa de comercio mayorista de plantas decorativas del Instituto de Plantas Decorativas de Pyongyang, Jang Pok Hwa (45 anos de edad), dijo que crecieron los pedidos y los visitantes a su centro de trabajo antes y durante los primeros dias del Ano Nuevo.
					
					El Restaurante Okryu, el Restaurante Chongryu, el Restaurante de Fideos de Pyongyang y otras unidades de servicios gastronomicos expenden los platos de fiesta como fideo en caldo frio.
					
					Los restaurantes adscritos a la Direccion de Servicio Changgwang ofertan el te Unjong, la carne asada, etc.
					
					En el Complejo de Servicios de Higiene Ryugyong y el Complejo de Servicios de Higiene Changgwang se pudo distinguir a los capitalinos llenos de alegria.
					
					El Cine Taedongmun, el Teatro del Pueblo, el Circo de Pyongyang, el Area de Recreo del Pueblo de Rungna son tambien los lugares mas visitados.

articles.title: Capitalinos acogen el Ano Nuevo con orgullo y felicidad
articles.content:
Capitalinos acogen el Ano Nuevo con orgullo y felicidad
						
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Comenzo el segundo ano de la nueva centuria de la Era Juche de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					En su mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un exhorto a unirse compactamente en torno al partido bajo la bandera de kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y luchar energicamente por la prosperidad de la patria.
					
					Escuchando por TV la voz resonante de su lider joven, todos los militares y habitantes coreanos imaginan el futuro maravilloso de la nacion.
					
					Las avenidas capitalinas se engalanaron de fiesta por el Ano Nuevo que se acogio con la inmensa alegria proveniente de lanzamiento exitoso de la unidad no.2 del satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong-3".
					
					Por doquier de la capital se ven las banderas nacionales y las rojas que dejan entrever la voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de apoyar con fidelidad la direccion del Mariscal.
					
					El Centro de Patinaje al Aire Libre del Pueblo, el patinadero de ruedas, el Centro de Gimnasia de la Avenida Thong-il y otras partes estan llenas de los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares que pasan agradables ratos de descanso.

articles.title: Presidium de la APS y Consejo de Ministros ofrecen banquete por Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Presidium de la APS y Consejo de Ministros ofrecen banquete por Ano Nuevo
						
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo 2013, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, ofrecieron el dia primero un banquete en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo. 
					Estuvieron presentes en la recepcion Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros, las instituciones de fuerzas armadas, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales asi como los heroes y hombres benemeritos.
					
					Fueron invitados el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los compatriotas residentes en ultramar, los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, los representantes de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea.
					
					La palabra de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC.
					
					Al levantar la ola de patriotismo de Kim Jong Il bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, nuestros militares y habitantes registraron viraje trascendental en la construccion de Estado prospero y balancearon con orgullo la historia centenaria de la Corea del Juche, comenzo el orador.
					
					El exito total de lanzamiento de satelite artificial cientifico-tecnico devino un acontecimiento especial que materializo el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y demostro el avanzado nivel de ciencias y tecnologias espaciales y el poderio integral de la Corea del Juche, significo. 
					
					Al final, expuso la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC de luchar dinamicamente por construir en territorio patrio un Estado reunificado, prospero y poderoso en acato al legado de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y esforzarse ingentemente por defender la paz y seguridad de la region y verificar la independencia en el mundo entero.
